Detailed Description

The GisIPoint class is a point Geometry type.

Definition at line 32 of file IPoint.h.


Public Member Functions

virtual GISGEOM_API const
double * 		GetOrdinates ()=0
 Gets the ordinates as an array.
virtual GISGEOM_API GisIDirectPosition * GetPosition () const =0
 Gets the position of this point Geometry.
virtual GISGEOM_API void GetPositionByMembers (double *x, double *y, double *z, double *m, GisInt32 *dimensionality) const =0
 Gets the position of this point Geometry, by values of its member data. This is in aid of higher performance for any implementation that does not internally use GisIDirectPosition objects for storage, or for an application seeking to avoid overhead of accessor methods.
